#labels Phase-Design
set security of album

secured album cannot by included in special categories (like competitions etc...) 

*value:*

0 = unsecured album

1 = album secured by:

*is in:*

[CreateAlbum] [EmptyAlbum] [SetAlbumUploading]

*example:*

{{{
<albumSecure>1</albumSecure>
<albumSecureName>[AlbumSecureName]</albumSecureName>
<albumSecurePass>[AlbumSecurePassword]</albumSecurePass>
}}}
